private_fridge.name: Fridge name
private_fridge.accounts_empty_list: No users found for the selected parameters
private_fridge.empty_list: No refrigerators found for the selected filtering parameters

create_private_fridge.form_description_content: When you create a fridge, you automatically become its owner.

archive_fridge.title: Do you want to leave the fridge?
archive_fridge.description: This is an irreversible action. Once you leave the fridge, you won't be able to return without a new invitation.

invitation.sent_empty_list: No sent invitations found for the selected parameters
invitation.sent_title: Send an invitation to the fridge
invitation.cancel_description: Wysłane zaproszenie do lodówki prywatnej zostanie anulowane.

form.title: Add a product to your private fridge
form.description: You can scan the barcode on the product, and the app will fill in the relevant information
form.name: Name

fridge.title_min: Fridge title must be at least 3 characters long.
fridge.description_min: Fridge description must be at least 3 characters long.

account.username_min: Username must be at least 6 characters long.

product.name_min: Product name must be at least 3 characters long.
product.quantity_min: Product quantity cannot be less than 1.
product.amount_min: The number of products added at once cannot be less than 1.
product.amount_max: The number of products added at once cannot exceed 100.
product.days_to_eat_min: The number of days of product suitability after opening cannot be less than 1.
product.days_to_eat_max: The number of days of product suitability after opening cannot exceed 360.

error_message.error: There was an error displaying the list of private fridges.
error_message.invitations_error: There was an error displaying the list of invitations.
error_message.private_fridge_create_error: An error occurred while creating the fridge.
error_message.image_upload: An error occurred while uploading the photo.
error_message.add_product: An error occurred while adding a photo.
error_message.find_product: An error occurred while searching for the product.

success_message.image_upload: The photo has been successfully uploaded.

account.not_found: User with this name not found.

invitation.receiverIsAlreadyInFridgeException: User with this name is already added.
invitation.invitationForThisReceiverIsAlreadySentEx: User with this name has already received an invitation.
